paper.title: Hybrid Intelligent Patent Mapping for Offshore Wind Industry Analysis
paper.abstract: Offshore wind technology is the most popular in recent years, the field of energy technology issues, was becoming increasingly relevant research. However, the research is still lack in the patent portfolio. This study examines numerous patent and use Intelligent clustering method try to identify appropriate patents by examining all-world patent pool cases of offshore wind power development, a form of alternative energy, and analyzing technology and patent maps. Thus, we identified a promising research direction, thereby enabling industry personnel to make technological breakthroughs in this field.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是使用智能聚类方法分析海上风电技术的专利组合，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
